choices.name: Get started with research for your Mississippi ancestors.

hidden.content:
• Learn successful research strategies for Mississippi ancestors.
  • Record Finder: Use the Record Finder to determine records for Mississippi research.

content.text:
1. Introduction: Learn about basic Mississippi research strategies.

    ☆ FS—Basic Mississippi Research Tips and Strategies

  2. Get an overview of Mississippi research in this video.

    ☆ FS—Mississippi Overview—3:46

  3. Follow this research study for Mississippi ancestors, from 1880 to the present.

    ☆ FS—Step-by-Step Mississippi Research, 1880-Present

  4. Ancestry: Explore resources for Mississippi research on Ancestry.

    ☆ AC—Mississippi Resources
    ☆ AC—Mississippi State Research Guide, 5 pgs.

  5. Record Finder: Use the Mississippi Record Finder to decide on records to search.

    ☆ FS—Mississippi Record Finder

    6. Additional Records
    1. Explore a variety of records on the ☆LDSGenealogy site.
    2. Explore historical photo sites on ☆Ancestor Hunt.
    3. Explore resources for school yearbooks on the ☆Ancestor Hunt site.

    Ethnic
    1. African American: Learn about African Americans in Mississippi in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

      ☆ FS—Wiki: African American Resources for Mississippi

    2. Learn more about African American records.

      ☆ AG—Mississippi African American Records

    3. Explore the African American Gateway for Mississippi.
    4. Native American: Learn about American Indians in Mississippi in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

      ☆ FS—Wiki: Indians of Mississippi


Additional Records
  1. Explore a variety of records on the ☆LDSGenealogy site.
  2. Explore historical photo sites on ☆Ancestor Hunt.
  3. Explore resources for school yearbooks on the ☆Ancestor Hunt site.
Ethnic
  1. African American: Learn about African Americans in Mississippi in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: African American Resources for Mississippi

  2. Learn more about African American records.

    ☆ AG—Mississippi African American Records

  3. Explore the African American Gateway for Mississippi.
  4. Native American: Learn about American Indians in Mississippi in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Indians of Mississippi

1. Explore Mississippi historical resources on FamilySearch.

    ☆ FS—Mississippi History

  2. Explore Mississippi history on Wikipedia.

    ☆ History
    ☆ History of Mississippi

  3. Learn about Mississippi history on InfoPlease.com.

    ☆ Mississippi History

choices.name: Learn about Mississippi archives and libraries.

hidden.content:
• Explore statewide and regional collections.
  • Explore books and photos that can be helpful in your research.

• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for archives and libraries. Then use the learnings for searches for a U.S. ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

content.text:
1. Learn about Mississippi archives and libraries in these articles.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Mississippi Archives and Libraries
    ☆ Mississippi State Archives: Wonderful Local Sources for Genealogical Research

  2. Explore the State Archives and Libraries site for Mississippi.
  3. Explore the Mississippi Dept. of Archives and History collection.
  4. Explore the Mississippi Digital Library site.
  5. Explore the ☆Books We Own site for Mississippi genealogy publications. Volunteers may be available for lookup services.
  6. Search for ☆free online books on Mississippi research on the FamilySearch site.
  7. Photos: Explore historical photo resources on the ☆Ancestor Hunt site.

hidden.content:
• Explore city and county directories to find Mississippi ancestors.
  • Discover the different types of information in directories, such as streets, churches, historical info, etc.

• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for city directories. Then use the learnings for searches for a U.S. ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

content.text:
1. Learn about Mississippi city directories in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Mississippi Directories

  2. Sites: Explore Mississippi city directories on the Ancestor Hunt site.
  3. Find out more about city directories in this research guide from Ancestry.

    ☆ AC—Six Things to Find—3 pgs.

  4. Explore Mississippi city directories on the ☆Ancestry site.
  5. Explore Mississippi ☆historical directories by county.
  6. Explore additional links for Mississippi city directories on the ☆LDSGenealogy site.

hidden.content:
• Find online resources for vital records.
  • Learn the history of vital records in the state of Mississippi.
  • Learn about alternates for vital records in Mississippi.

• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for vital records. Then use the learnings for searches for a U.S. ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

content.text:
1. Learn about Mississippi vital records in these articles.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Mississippi Vital Records
    ☆ AC—Wiki: Mississippi Vital Records

  2. Explore links for vital records on the Mississippi State Dept. of Health site.
  3. Search for online Mississippi ☆vital records and find addresses for state offices to write to for records.
  4. Explore Mississippi birth, marriage, and death records on the ☆AccessGenealogy site.
  5. Explore additional links for Mississippi vital records on the ☆Linkpendium site.

hidden.content: • Find birth records for Mississippi ancestors.

• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for birth and adoption records. Then use the learnings for searches for a U.S. ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

content.text:
1. Learn how to find Mississippi birth records in this article.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: How to Find Mississippi Birth Records

  2. Explore additional links for Mississippi birth records on the ☆LDSGenealogy site.

QUIKLinks

hidden.content: • Find marriage records for Mississippi ancestors.

• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for marriage and divorce records. Then use the learnings for searches for a U.S. ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

content.text:
1. Learn how to find Mississippi marriage records with FamilySearch.
  2. Explore links for Mississippi marriage records.
  3. Explore additional links for Mississippi marriage records on the ☆LDSGenealogy site.

QUIKLinks

choices.name: Explore Mississippi obituaries and death records.

hidden.content:
• Find obituaries for Mississippi ancestors.
  • Find death records and death indexes for Mississippi ancestors.

• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for marriage and divorce records. Then use the learnings for searches for a U.S. ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

content.text:
1. Explore the ObituariesHelp site for Mississippi obituaries.
  2. Explore The Ancestor Hunt for obituaries.
  3. Search for obituaries by county on the Newspaperobituaries.net site.
  4. Find additional resources for Mississippi obituaries on the ☆Linkpendium site.
Mississippi Death Records
  1. Learn how to find Mississippi death records in this article.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: How to Find Mississippi Death Records

  2. Explore the Ancestors at Rest site for Mississippi death records.
  3. Explore Mississippi death records, indexes, and obituaries.
  4. Explore additional links for Mississippi death records on the ☆LDSGenealogy site.

QUIKLinks

choices.name: Explore Mississippi census and voter records.

hidden.content:
• Explore state and county census records for Mississippi ancestors.
  • Find voter registration records in Mississippi.

content.text:
1. Get an overview of Mississippi censuses in these articles.

    ☆ FS—Mississippi Census
    ☆ AC—Mississippi Census Records

  2. Explore the MyFreeCensus site for Mississippi state and county census records.
  3. Explore additional links for Mississippi census records on the ☆LDSGenealogy site.
  4. Explore Mississippi census records on the ☆AccessGenealogy site.
  5. Learn about Mississippi voting registers in these articles.

    ☆ FS—Mississippi Voting Registers

    ☆ FS—Mississippi Church Records

  2. Explore additional links for Mississippi church records on the ☆LDSGenealogy site.

hidden.content: • Find cemetery records for Mississippi ancestors from a number of sources.

• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for cemetery records. Then use the learnings for searches for a U.S. ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

content.text:
1. Explore Mississippi cemetery records in this article.

    ☆ FS—Mississippi Cemetery Records

  2. Browse the ☆Interment.net site for Mississippi cemetery records.
  3. Search for Mississippi cemetery records online.
  4. Explore Mississippi cemetery records on the ☆AccessGenealogy site.
  5. Explore additional links for Mississippi cemetery records on the ☆LDSGenealogy site.
  6. Explore the ☆Tombstone Transcription Project on the U.S. GenWeb site.
  7. Search the ☆Find A Grave site for cemetery records.
  8. Search the ☆BillionGraves site for cemetery records.
  9. See additional cemetery resources on the Mississippi ☆Linkpendium site.
  10. Explore ☆African American cemetery records in Mississippi.

  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

content.text:
1. Learn about Mississippi probate records in these articles.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Mississippi Probate Records

  2. Explore additional links for Mississippi probate records on the ☆LDSGenealogy site.

choices.name: Learn about Mississippi maps and gazetteers.

hidden.content:
• Learn about the history of Mississippi maps.
  • Find out how Mississippi gazetteers can help you in your research.

content.text:
1. Learn about Mississippi maps in these articles.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Mississippi Maps
    ☆ AC—Wiki: Mississippi Maps

  2. Learn about Mississippi gazetteers in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Mississippi Gazetteers

  3. Access interactive maps and atlases of Mississippi on the ☆MapsofUS site.
  4. Find Mississippi towns and communities on the RoadsideThoughts site.

hidden.content:
• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for maps and gazetteers. Then use the learnings for searches for a U.S. ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

content.text:
1. Explore the ☆David Rumsey collection of Mississippi maps.
  2. Explore the ☆Perry-Castaneda site for maps of Mississippi.
  3. Explore historical Mississippi maps on the Historic Map Works site.
  4. Explore the ☆Old Maps Online site for Mississippi maps.
  5. Explore the ☆Old Maps of Mississippi on the Wikipedia site.
    6. Exercises
    • * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for maps and gazetteers. Then use the learnings for searches for a U.S. ancestor.
    • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Mississippi Newspapers
    ☆ AC—Wiki: Mississippi Periodicals, Newspapers, and Manuscripts

hidden.content:
• Find research clues in the Library of Congress historical newspaper collection.
  • Search Mississippi online newspaper sites.

• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for newspaper records. Then use the learnings for searches for a U.S. ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

  2. Search the Mississippi Online Historical Newspapers site.
  3. Explore Mississippi newspaper resources on the ☆Ancestor Hunt site.
  4. See additional Mississippi newspaper resources on the Linkpendium site.
  5. Explore additional links for Mississippi newspapers and obituaries on the ☆LDSGenealogy site.

choices.name: Use the QUIKLinks (lightning bolts) or Mississippi County links (bottom) to quickly search common record collections for Mississippi.

content.text:
Note : To search records on these sites, you must be registered on the site or be at a FamilySearch Center.

  1. In the QUIKLinks, click the link for FamilySearch, Ancestry, Findmypast, or MyHeritage to view the corresponding record collection.
  2. Scroll down near the bottom of this page to see available county records. Click the name of the county for FamilySearch, or A for Ancestry, or L for Linkpendium.

1. In FamilySearch, explore the Mississippi Online Genealogy Records page for a variety of record collections.
  2. In each program (FamilySearch, Ancestry, or Findmypast), explore additional record collections besides the ones listed in QUIKLinks.

choices.name: Use Facebook pages to get answers to your questions.

content.text:
1. Visit the Mississippi Genealogy Network page on Facebook.
  2. Visit the Mississippi Genealogy page on Facebook.
  3. Visit the Mississippi - Just Ask! page on Facebook.
  4. Visit the Mississippi Genealogy, Family Tree & History Group page on Facebook.
  5. Visit the U.S. South Genealogy Research page on Facebook.
  6. See the Genealogy on Facebook list of Facebook groups dedicated to helping with research for Mississippi.

1. Join the RootsChat forum and post questions about Mississippi research.
  2. Explore the Mississippi research mailing lists on Cyndi's List.
  3. Use the ☆Ancestry message boards to read or post questions about Mississippi research.

hidden.content:
• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for newspaper records. Then use the learnings for searches for a U.S. ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

content.text:
1. Learn about genealogy societies in Mississippi in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Mississippi Societies

  2. Explore the Mississippi Genealogical Society site.
  3. Explore the Mississippi Historical Society site.
  4. Explore Mississippi genealogy society sites on Cyndi's List.
  5. Get help at a family history center in Mississippi.
